page.title: 15TEENAGE DRESS
page.content: A teen-age girls wardrobe will contain baggy trousers and baggy shirts at least two sizes larger than she needs.Trouser legs are rolled up and worn with flat shoes or "pin-heel" shoes and tee-shirts or "bat-wing"jumpers. Many of the trousers and tops are unisex.Skirts tend to be mini or 3/4 length.The material is mostly in cotton in pastel shades of pink,blue,lemon and green,although very bright colours are worn too,usually in the form of accessories such as belts,shoes and bags.Eye catching ear-rings,bracelets and anklets of brightly coloured plastic are popular and a great deal of importance is placed on hair (style and colour) and make-up.
